verbs.description: That [V: could] be a problem if Trump ever sits down for an interview with Robert Mueller .
[ARG1: That] [ARGM-MOD: could] [V: be] [ARG2: a problem] [ARGM-ADV: if Trump ever sits down for an interview with Robert Mueller] .
That could be a problem if [ARG1: Trump] [ARGM-TMP: ever] [V: sits] down [ARGM-PRP: for an interview with Robert Mueller] .
